overview:
“Ken Wee brings 22 years of telecommunications experience with both vendors and operators including planning and building of data and cellular networks, pre and post sales technical support, sales management, and general management positions.

Prior to joining Dilithium, Mr. Wee was Vice President, Projects and Operations Management for Bridge Mobile, Asia Pacificâ€™s largest mobile alliance group. He oversaw implementation of a mobile delivery services platform and integration with content providers systems, implementation of a regional pre-paid top up system, and implementation of a traffic redirection platform as well as overseeing and maintaining all IT systems for the networks.

Prior to Bridge Mobile, Mr. Wee held a variety of senior management positions including Director Technical Support and Vice President and General Manager Asia Pacific, with Glenayre Electronics, a global leader in providing open, standards-based enhanced services and unified communications solutions for more than 200 service providers in over 60 countries.

Mr. Wee began his career at Singtel as a Project Engineer in the Mobile Networks Group, helping design, build and manage both paging and cellular networks.

Mr. Wee holds a BS in Electronics Engineering from the City University, London, UK.” (Source: Dilithium Networks)
